title: Interpret p-value for test of mean VOCs in carpet

content.prompt: Which of the following statements is the best interpretation of the p-value?

choices.label: The probability that the null hypothesis is true is 0.095.
The probability that the alternative hypothesis is true is 0.095.
The probability of observing a mean reduction of 13 ppm is 0.095.
If the null hypothesis is true, the probability of observing a mean reduction of at least 13 ppm is 0.095.
If the null hypothesis is true, the probability of observing a mean reduction of at most 13 ppm is 0.095.

topic.text: 7.9: Carrying Out a Test for the Difference of Two Population Means

skill.text: Skill 4.B: Interpret statistical calculations and findings to assign meaning or assess a claim.
